name: Spiced Orange Olive Oil Cake
author: ChefJackie
summary: With just a touch of sweetness, this olive oil cake has a hint of orange zest and five-spice powder. If you don't eat it all the first day, cut it into cubes and layer with whipped cream and oranges, or toast and slather with honey.
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Lightly oil and flour a loaf pan
Beat eggs in a bowl until lightened in color
Add sugar, olive oil, orange zest, and five-spice powder and beat until smooth
Fold flour, baking powder, and salt into egg mixture until batter is just mixed
Pour batter into the prepared loaf pan
Bake in the preheated oven until a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean, about 45 minutes
Cool in the pan for 10 minutes
Remove cake from the pan and cool on a wire rack
